Description:
Detects call to "Win32_QuickFixEngineering" in order to enumerate installed hotfixes often used in "enum" scripts by attackers

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: PowerShell Hotfix Enumeration
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (scriptblocktext like '%win32_quickfixengineering%' and scriptblocktext like '%hotfixid%')
